menuItemAmazonInvoices.description: Finds all links to Amazon invoices on the current page and automatically downloads them.

menuItemAmazonInvoicesAdvance.description: Finds all links to Amazon invoices on the current page and automatically downloads them, advancing to next page.

menuItemAmazonInvoicesRetreat.description: Finds all links to Amazon invoices on the current page and automatically downloads them, retreating to prior page.
